meta.description: Determine the least expensive way to meet all nutritional needs from a selection of food items.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Different food items available for the meal plan.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per unit of each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content per unit of each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content per unit of each food item.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food item to include in the meal plan.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the meal plan.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the meal plan provides at least 70 grams of protein.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the meal plan provides at least 187 grams of carbohydrates.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the meal plan provides at least 2181 calories.
